name: Umineko Screenshot Generator
description: Umineko Screenshot Generator, using the PS3 sprites and backgrounds.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing `umineko` cog! 
This cog requires a specific version of pillow and regex, be sure to restart your bot after installation if it doesn't work! 

⚠️ IMPORTANT: This cog uses a lot of data (+400 MB) that needs to be downloaded separately.
Download the asset folder from https://lena.moe/umineko.zip and paste it in the cog folder /CogManager/umineko/data/

⚠️ This cog is slash command only!
author: Glas
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store end user data.
